fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Pandemonium: The first time you empty your hand, activate a Minigun?! that targets a random 5 non-Chaos people. The attack will appear to be from nobody.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ruse: Pick a player. The next time they learn something, it will be incorrect. Affects up to Susceptible checks. [Infinite uses, 3 CD]
- Scheme: The next 2 attacks played by Chaos will appear to come from 2 random non-Chaos players. (Reforged) [Infinite uses, 4 CD] 
- Getaway: Choose a player. If they die from non-event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]
